title: Deposit growth is top issue for Indian lenders: Federal Bank
description: Indian banks struggled with deposit growth as customers explored diverse investment options. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das emphasized the need for banks to innovate. Federal Bank reported a balanced increase in deposits and credits, each by 20% annually, but potential new RBI rules could impact lending.
